text:
-Okay, so, Dwight,
in your own words,

"Someone replaced all my pen
and pencils with crayons.
I suspect Jim Halpert."

"Everyone has called me Dwayne
all day.

I think Jim Halpert
paid them to."

-[ Laughs ] Yes.
5 bucks each.
And it was totally worth it.

-"This morning, I found a bloody
glove in my desk drawer,

and Jim Halpert tried to
convince me I committed murder

I think he may be
the real murderer."

"Jim Halpert said
there was an abandoned infan
in the women's room.

When I went to save the child,
I saw Meredith on the can.
[ Hisses ] God.

"This morning, I knocked mysel
in the head with the phone."
-[ Chuckles ]
That actually took a while

I had to put, uh, more and mor
nickels into his handset
until he got used to the weight,

and then I just
took them all out.

-"Every time I typed my name
it said 'diapers.'"
-Just a simple macro.

You know, these actually
don't sound that funny
one after another.
But he does deserve it, though
-"By the end of the day,

my desk was about two feet
closer to the copier."

-Yeah.
I just moved it an inch

every time
he went to the bathroom.

And that's how I spent
my entire day that day.
[ Telephone rings ]

-The Japanese have this thin
called shiatsu massage

where they dig into your bod
very hard,
and it is very painful.

And apparently,
some people throw up.

But the next day,
they feel great.

I've never had one.
They sound awful.

[ Camera shutter clicks ]
-Maybe Stanford would be cool.
-It's a good market.
Higher volume.
-Yeah.

Maybe we should both go.
[ Chuckles ]

-I have a girlfriend.
-Sure you do, Dwight. Sure

-Hey.
There's like 300 more of these
Let's get to them later.

-Sir, are you gonna transfer Jim
or not?

-Maybe.
I haven't decided yet.

Let's get to work.
-I want an answer by tomorrow.
-Okay.

Ooh.
Actually, tomorrow's not good.
How about later in the week?
-Fine.
-Good. Okay.
[ Telephone rings ]
Hey! Wait.

How about a group picture,
while you're here?

-I can't. I only get reimburse
for the I.D. photos.

Well, it's a computer camera
right?
-You mean digital?

-Yeah.
It'll take like two seconds.
-20 bucks.

-[ Sighs loudly ]
Alright.

Everybody, come on.
Group photo for the newsletter
-You've gotta be kidding.

-Come on, everybody.
-Come on. Let's go.

Creed, Kevin, Oscar, andale.
Let's go. [ Claps ]

-1, 2, 3. Smile.
Try to smile.

-We resolved a lot today,
everybody. Think happy thoughts.

-Alright, I'm just gonna tak
it on three,

whether you smile or not.
1, 2, 3.

[ Camera shutter clicks ]
-Good.
Let's check that out.
Eww. Okay.

Alright. One more.
Take one more.

-That'll be another $20.
-What?

-Angela, I want to talk to you
about something.

-What?
-No, Pam.

-I am.
It's about the save the date

-Pam, it wasn't her.
-What?

I'm the one
who complained about you.

-[ Sighs, claps ]
Alright, come on. One more time.

-I-I didn't know that Toby
was gonna write it down.

[ Camera shutter clicks ]
-Good.

-I was just venting.
-Check that out.

-You know, it was just --
It was one day.
